turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to order that pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what topping would you like on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like pepperoni, sausage, and bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The bacon is considered an extra, so that adds $2.50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I also have thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I have a small?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a small pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a second pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a small pepperoni, sausage with extra bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I order another pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a small cheese pizza with pepperoni and a thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order one more pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a small thin-crust pizza with mushrooms and green peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. Anything else you'd like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have 3 small pizzas. One is pepperoni, sausage and bacon, the other is cheese and pepperoni and the third is green peppers and mushrooms. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your total is $83.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizzas will be ready for pickup shortly!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Bye!
